content: Nail-embedded wood reciprocating saw blades (heavy-duty) Heavy-duty reciprocating saw blade for demolishing wood containing nails – extra-strong in metal, fast in wood ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Durable bimetal blades optimized for cutting power in metal and cutting speed in wood Heavy-duty build – thicker-gauge blades like these are essential when you need stability and durability Redesigned tooth setting – cuts faster through metal-embedded wood Three lengths available – choosing the right length based on the shape of your workpiece can increase comfort and efficiency Applications Faster cuts for extra-heavy-duty demolition work Cutting wood beams Cutting strut Demolishing metal-embedded wood ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Shank: 1/2 in universal shank Teeth per inch: 6 Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Shank | 1/2 in universal shank | Teeth per inch | 6 | Blade features | Long life, Heavy duty ### ITEMS- 2194398 - Recip. saw blade SP 6 6 (5) heavy w/m - Package Size 5 pc - 2194393 - Recip. saw blade SP 6 6 (20) heavy w/m - Package Size 20 pc - 2194399 - Recip. saw blade SP 9 6 (5) heavy w/m - Package Size 5 pc - 2194394 - Recip. saw blade SP 9 6 (20) heavy w/m - Package Size 20 pc - 2194395 - Recip. saw blade SP 12 6 (20) heavy w/m - Package Size 20 pc
